entry.title: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢: Last week the @ArweaveTeam ecosystem launched 6 new tools and protocols: - Vouch Protocol...
entry.summary: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢 Last week the @ArweaveTeam ecosystem launched 6 new tools and protocols: - Vouch Protocol - VouchDAO - Stamps - StampCoin - Programmably Exchangable Tokens - burntAR Here's a quick overview of what was launched and how these tools and protocols work: 🧵 Arweave Team: 6 huge innovations are launching in the Arweave ecosystem today. Together, these new services will bootstrap the web of value on the permaweb, leading to a web where all content is natively exchangeable, and monetizable (without ads). 🚀 Strap in. This is gonna get wild. 👇

entry.summary: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢 Thrilled to announce Modular Fellows - a 3 month program for developers, builders, and researchers interested in building on modular blockchain networks like Celestia! 🏕️ I'll be driving this program and working directly with participants. Applications are now open. Celestia: Today, we’re excited to announce Modular Fellows, a new program that supports and mentors modular builders. https://blog.celestia.org/introducing-modular-fellows/
